      • getCurrentActivity

        public static android.app.Activity getCurrentActivity()
                                               throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Gets an Activity in the RESUMED stage.

        This method should never be called from the Main thread. In certain situations there might be more than one Activities in RESUMED stage, but only one is returned. See ActivityLifecycleMonitor.

        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException

      • withToolbarTitle

        public static org.hamcrest.Matcher<android.view.View> withToolbarTitle(int resourceId)
        Matches the toolbar title with a specific string resource.
        Parameters:
        resourceId - the ID of the string resource to match
